author: Harper Lee
review: The book is more than a physical journey; it’s a spiritual quest to uncover one’s true purpose in life. Coelho’s writing is simple yet poetic, delivering timeless lessons on the importance of following one’s dreams, listening to one’s heart, and recognizing the signs the universe provides.
